mapper.select: SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "R", rLevel, rTime, quantity, rImg, rName FROM RECIPE ORDER BY QUANTITY) C WHERE C.R >= 1 AND C.R <= 8 ORDER BY ROWNUM

SELECT ROWNUM, RNUM, MNUM, RNAME, RIMG, QUANTITY, RTIME, RLEVEL, INUM, IQUAN, SUBINGREDIENT, RDATE, RINTRO, RREPORT, RRECOMMEND, RCOUNT FROM RECIPE R WHERE R.SUBINGREDIENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR R.RNAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' AND ROWNUM >=1 AND ROWNUM <=8
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE R WHERE R.SUBINGREDIENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR R.RNAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE R WHERE R.SUBINGREDIENT LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' OR R.RNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECIPE R WHERE R.SUBINGREDIENT LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' OR R.RNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'

SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "R", rLevel, rTime, quantity, rImg, rName, rCount FROM RECIPE P WHERE SUBINGREDIENT LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' OR RNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' ORDER BY P.RCOUNT DESC) C WHERE C.R >= 1 AND C.R <= 8

SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS "R", rLevel, rTime, quantity, rImg, rName, rCount FROM RECIPE P WHERE SUBINGREDIENT LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' OR RNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' ORDER BY P.RCOUNT DESC) C WHERE C.R >= #{inquiryStartCount} AND C.R <= #{inquiryEndCount}

SELECT ROWNUM AS "R", RNUM, MNUM, RNAME, RIMG, QUANTITY, RTIME, RLEVEL, INUM, IQUAN, SUBINGREDIENT, RDATE, RINTRO, RREPORT, RRECOMMEND, RCOUNT FROM (SELECT RNUM, MNUM, RNAME, RIMG, QUANTITY, RTIME, RLEVEL, INUM, IQUAN, SUBINGREDIENT, RDATE, RINTRO, RREPORT, RRECOMMEND, RCOUNT FROM RECIPE ORDER BY RRECOMMEND DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
